projectDescription.details: This project is an unofficial reimagining of the Amana Waterpark website, developed as part of a college web development related course. Built using the React framework, the goal of this project was to create a modern, dynamic, and responsive web interface that enhances user engagement and improves navigational flow, while maintaining the brand's recreational and family-friendly image.
projectDescription.details2: The rework focuses on delivering a clean and intuitive user experience through component-based architecture and responsive design techniques. Key features of the website include:

keypoints.point: Homepage: Engaging hero section with featured attractions and announcements.
Attractions Page: Interactive cards showcasing pools, slides, and leisure areas with descriptions and photos.
Rates & Packages: Clearly structured pricing information for both passes, cottages/rooms, and other amenities.
Media Gallery: An image gallery to highlight the parkâ€™s facilities.
Contact & Location: A downloadable map image, contact form using controlled components.
